group.name: Plugin Commands: OTA Client
group.description: The OTA Client plugin provides Over-the-air commands for upgrading firmware and downloading specific files on the client side.

command.description: Bootloads the image at the specified index by calling the OTA bootload callback.

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index at which to begin bootloading the image

command.description: Perform signature verification on the image at the specified index

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index at which to begin verification of the image

command.description: Prints the manufacturer ID, Image Type ID, and Version information that are used when a query next image is sent to the server by the client
Starts the ota client state machine. The state machine discovers the OTA server, queries for new images, downloads the images and waits for the server command to upgrade
Prints information on the current state of the OTA client download.
Sends an image block request for a file the server should not have. Test harness only (test case 9.5.6 - Missing File)

arg.name: pageRequest
arg.description: boolean value turning on (1) or off (0) the page request flag
